name: Tank Commander: Battlefield (itch)
description:
Get ready to blow up the tanks, shoot for the enemy tanks and claim victory. Accept your commander missions, firing to kill enemy tanks . You need be a tanks hero to win WW2 Battles.

Game Features:

- Playable countries: USA, Germany, United Kigdom, Soviet Union, Japan and Italy- Good graphics
- Realistic WWII Tanks
- Easy to play
- Realistic sounds
- Historycal WWII Battles

Missions:
  • Battle of Brody 1941
  • Battle of El Alamein 1942
  • Battle of Stalingrad 1943
  • Battle of Kursk 1943
  • Battle of Normandy 1944
  • Battle of Berlin 1945
